page.title: 15A Personal Opinion
page.content:
Camberley is now getting too built up, too many{office blocks}with no owners. There are too many new houses and housing estates, and not enough beds in the hospital.
Camberley's main roads are always overcrowded with not enough traffic wardens.
The train services to London and Guildford are good although perhaps there should be some new trains.
Living quite near the Motorway, you can hear the traffic when the wind is blowing that way, but more annoying are the{helicopters}which frequently fly overhead.
Well that's what I think!
